# formatDescription

**Instance Property**

An object describing the capture format.

## Declaration

```swift
var formatDescription: CMFormatDescription { get }
```

## Discussion

Calling this method doesn’t assume ownership of the returned [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreMedia/CMFormatDescription].

## Determining supported media formats

- **mediaType**: A constant describing the media type of an `AVCaptureDevice` active or supported format.
